translation: You have a right to perform your prescribed duties, but you are not entitled to the fruits of your actions.

sanskrit: योगस्थः कुरु कर्माणि सङ्गं त्यक्त्वा धनञ्जय।
translation: Perform your duty equipoised, O Arjuna, abandoning all attachment to success or failure.
A person who is engaged in spiritual intelligence becomes freed from both good and bad actions even in this life.
